pageContent: Purpose of review: We summarize the evidence on accurate target definition, precise imaging, and guiding systems that are a necessary ground to targeted focal therapy.

metaData.source:
Medium-term oncological outcomes in a large cohort of men treated with either focal or hemi-ablation using high-intensity focused ultrasonography for primary localized prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/30753756/
